required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Vaginal Misoprostol and Dinoprostone Prior to Copper Intrauterine Device Insertion in Nulliparous Women
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Vaginal Misoprostol and Dinoprostone Prior to Copper Intrauterine Device Insertion in Nulliparous Women:a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the effect of vaginal dinoprostone versus vaginal misoprostol administered before the copper intrauterine device(IUD) insertion in reducing IUD inertion pain and the difficulty in inserting the IUD in nulliparous women.

detailed_description.textblock: Long-acting reversible contraception methods are highly effective methods for reduction of the unplanned pregnancy rate worldwide. The intrauterine device is a single procedure that provides reliable, effective and long term contraception for many women. However, the insertion procedure can be associated with a troublesome degree of pain that prevent some women from choosing its use. Different interventions have been described to decrease pain perception during intrauterine device insertion with no agreement on an effective one.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: The difference in pain scores during intrauterine device insertion
primary_outcome.description: The difference in pain scores during intrauterine device insertion using visual analog scale from 0 to 10

secondary_outcome.measure: the difference in pain scores during tenaculum application
secondary_outcome.description: The difference in pain scores during tenaculum application using a visual analog scale from 0 to 10

secondary_outcome.measure: the difference in pain scores during sound insertion
secondary_outcome.description: The difference in pain scores during sound insertion using a visual analog scale from 0 to 10
the ease of IUD insertion using ease of insertion score from 0 to 10 cm (0 = very easy insertion, 10 cm = terribly difficult insertion)
women's satisfaction level using satisfaction score from 0 to 10 cm where 0 denotes no satisfaction and 10 denotes maximum satisfaction

arm_group.description: 1 vaginal tablet of dinoprostone (3mg) (prostin速 E2, Pharmacia & Upjohn, Puurs, Belgium) inserted by the study nurse 3 hours before IUD insertion.
1 vaginal tablet of misoprostol (200 mcg) (Misotac速; Sigma Pharma, SAE, Egypt) inserted by the study nurse 3 hours before IUD insertion.
one tablet of placebo inserted by the study nurse 3 hours before IUD insertion.

intervention.description: 1 vaginal tablet of dinoprostone (3mg) (prostin速 E2, Pharmacia & Upjohn, Puurs, Belgium) inserted by the study nurse 3hours before IUD insertion.
1 vaginal tablet of misoprostol (200mcg) (Misotac速; Sigma Pharma, SAE, Egypt) inserted by the study nurse 3 hours before IUD insertion.
one tablet of placebo inserted by the study nurse 3 hours before IUD insertion.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- nulliparous women requesting copper IUD insertion
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnancy, Parous women, contraindications or allergy to dinoprostone or misoprostol,contraindication to IUD insertion, untreated active cervicitis or vaginitis, undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding
